metadata.name: Scorched
metadata.description:
-Scorched-

Collaborative work
@stanoeska_s
@ISombres

..............................................................

Stanoeska interpretation: 

“Ain’t it warming you, the world gone up in flames?” - (Hozier,NFWMB)

An ode to the quiet rage; a ceremony of eradication; a love letter to chaos.


Isombres interpretation: 
 
to be as broken as the memory of your name. 
as indifferent as the rust growing on your inside.

even flowers grow in dirt.
